title: oc 5.0.6 - external storage - smb/cifs - not changing to given sub directory
body:
## expected behaviour

when you enter a sub-directory in the smb mount configuration it should automatically
been changed into this directory.

## actual behaviour

the smb mount is done and a given sub-directory is ignored so that the content of
the mounted directory is shown instead of the content of the sub-directory.

## steps to reproduce

1) create a `mount.php` file containing the following entry:

```php
<?php
return array(
  'user' => array(
    'jed' => array(
      '/$user/files/music'=>array('class'=>'oc_filestorage_smb','options'=>array('host'=>'server.privat.lan','user'=>'smbtest','password'=>'smppass','share'=>'/archive','/mp3')),
    ),
  ),
);
```

2) navigate to the files using the files tab and access the `music` share. the content of the `/archive` folder is shown instead of the the content of the `/archive/mp3` folder.

## environment

#### server configuration

os: linux 2.6.24-24
web server: apache/ 2.2.22
database: mysql
php version: 5.3.13
owncloud version: 5.0.6

#### client configuration

browser: firefox 21.0
operating system: windows 7
